echo-category-title-requestcustomdomain-: Comment added to a custom domain request
Status updated for a custom domain request
echo-pref-tooltip-requestcustomdomain-ne: Notify me when there are any new custom domain requests.
echo-pref-tooltip-requestcustomdomain-re: Notify me when there is a comment on an custom domain request that I have participated on.
Notify me when the status is updated for a custom domain request that I have participated on.
requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-comment-a: This custom domain has been successfully activated and is now applied to this wiki.
requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-comment-p: Since the requester is not a bureaucrat, a system administrator will manually review this request.
requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-comment-e: An error occurred while processing your custom domain request with Cloudflare. A system administrator will now manually review your request.
An error occurred while processing your request with Cloudflare. Cloudflare reported the following error: $1
An error occurred while verifying your custom domain is pointed correctly to Cloudflare. Cloudflare reported the following error: $1
requestcustomdomain-cloudflare-label-suc: This request has been queued for automatic Cloudflare processing. Please check back in a few minutes.
requestcustomdomain-comment-success: Comment successfully added to this request.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-disallo: The requested custom domain is not allowed. Please make sure to use a valid custom domain. If you think this is an error, please contact us.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-no-host: You have not inputted a hostname.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-not-a-u: You have not inputted a valid URL.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-protoco: Invalid protocol. Please make sure to set the protocol to https://.
requestcustomdomain-customdomain-unneede: There are unneeded components in the URL. Please only set the domain with the https:// protocol.
requestcustomdomain-desc: An extension designed to automate user custom domain requests.
requestcustomdomain-duplicate-request: Unable to submit this request. It is too similar to an already open request.
requestcustomdomainqueue-header-info: You can use this form to search through custom domain requests. Use the parameters below to refine your search.
requestcustomdomain-help-reason: Please add any additional comments that you think may be relevant to this request.
requestcustomdomain-help-customdomain: Enter the full URL for the desired custom domain (i.e. https://example.org).
requestcustomdomain-help-target: This must be a valid database name (i.e. examplewiki).
requestcustomdomain-help-target-subdomai: This must be a valid subdomain (i.e. examplewiki.wikifarm.com)
requestcustomdomain-info-requester-block: The requester ($1) has been locally blocked on this wiki ($2).
requestcustomdomain-info-requester-locke: The requester ($1) has been locked. This request should be declined.
requestcustomdomain-invalid-target: The provided target is not a valid database name.
requestcustomdomain-label-lock: Lock this request from being edited or from comments being added to it?
requestcustomdomain-label-status-updated: Optional additional comment to add to this request:
requestcustomdomain-label-update-status: Set the status of this request to:
requestcustomdomain-notcentral-text: Custom domains requests are unavailable on this wiki. Please request a custom domain configuration on the central wiki.
requestcustomdomain-notification-body-ne:
A new custom domain request was received.
Reason given: $1
Requester: $2
Target Database Name: $3
Custom domain URL: $4
requestcustomdomain-notification-header-: Custom domain request #$1 received a comment.
Status updated for custom domain request #$1
requestcustomdomain-notloggedin: Sorry, you need to [$1 log in] before you can request a custom domain configuration.
requestcustomdomain-request-locked: This request has been locked. It cannot be edited, and no comments can be added to it.
requestcustomdomain-status-updated-succe: Status successfully updated for this request.
requestcustomdomain-success: Your custom domain request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed as soon as possible.
requestcustomdomain-success-locked: This request has been successfully locked. It can no longer be edited and comments cannot be added to it.
requestcustomdomain-success-unlocked: This request has been successfully unlocked.
requestcustomdomain-log-header: This is a log of all custom domain requests and status updates.
logentry-requestcustomdomain-statusupdat: $1 {{GENDER:$2|updated}} status of custom domain request $4 to '$5'.
requestcustomdomain: Request to use a custom domain for your wiki
